name: PipeDream (dqmhose)
description:
This is my entry for the Trijam #85. Theme was hard-and-fast.

Instructions:

Use WASD or the arrow keys to move around - the little green arrow indicates the selected pipe.

Press SPACE to turn the currently selected pipe.

Goal:

Try to connect the green entry-pipe and the red exit-pipe.

(in WebGL, the red pipe is difficult to see)

3 hours did work out better the second time around, however I ran into multiple issues resulting in a recursive solution that .. doesn't always work. I salvaged the algorithm from some other projects.. or I would've never finished within around 3 hours.

Sometimes the puzzle is solved and it won't realize. Haven't found out yet why since according to the code it's been solved. Oh well .. 3 hours ..

Puzzles are random. I have not yet run into one that couldn't be solve, however it's probably possible.

Credits for used assets are ingame.
